data.eml:eml: Five new species of Tetranychidae (Acarina, Prostigmata) from south Tunisian oasis areas

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Auger, Philippe, Chaaban, Samah Ben, Grissa, Kaouthar Lebdi, Khoualdia, Othman, Flechtmann, Carlos H. W. (2009): Five new species of Tetranychidae (Acarina, Prostigmata) from south Tunisian oasis areas. Zootaxa 2232: 29-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190324
